message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this product. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is already a competitive price for what this product offers.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
